endpoints.description: Request and retrieve an authorization token for accessing the API services. This is the first step to ensure secure access and data integrity.
Fetch real-time ore grade information for a specific mining lot, providing insights into material quality and guiding extraction strategies.
Obtain current and historical extraction rate data across different mining lots to analyze trends over time and adjust operational strategies accordingly.
Retrieve detailed data on equipment usage, including operational time and idle periods, to evaluate equipment efficiency and optimize resource allocation.
Create automated alerts for preventive maintenance. Alerts notify relevant stakeholders of potential equipment issues based on historical wear-and-tear data to prevent unexpected failures.
Identify and list mining areas with the highest potential based on current and predicted ore grades, aiding in resource allocation and planning.
Generate comprehensive reports detailing current resource yield and compare it against historical performance to measure efficiency and productivity.
Register a new on-site monitoring sensor with the system, allowing it to stream real-time data into the service for enhanced monitoring.
Access advanced analytics reports that predict future trends in resource extraction, equipment usage, and ore grades to inform strategic planning.
Remove an existing maintenance alert, providing control over active alerts and ensuring relevancy.
